venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
August's FREE Community Evening at Roots and Wings, our gift to you:

Connecting to Your Best Self

Wednesday evening, August 10th, 7:15 - 8:45 pm

  • Are there times when you're not feeling quite sure about yourself?
  • Or are there times when you'd like to be prepared to be your best?
  • Would it be nice to have some easy ways to access your Best Self?

Tonight I'll guide you through three meditations (with some instruction and discussion, too): one to the deep core of your being, one with a tree, and one with clouds! They'll be meaningful AND fun!

My intention is to connect you to your inner brilliance, all the resources available to you, and the perfection that you are.  Sound good?  If so, join us, and invite your friends and family to join us, too!

Comments written after last month's "Who Am I?” -

"This event was phenomenal. Truly outstanding. I am SO glad I went. I left with a bunch of exciting, easy-to-apply tools for feeling better in any situation. Thanks, Ann! " Julia 

"Great meditations and discussion. A very inspirational group and leader!" Kathy 

"I enjoyed it very much. Ann facilitated a very relaxing evening and I felt a pleasant shift into more peacefulness and self acceptance as a result." Mick

So treat yourself to this wonderful free event for you. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Share this with your friends, family and groups. The class is appropriate for everyone, and all are welcome!
Space is limited, so registration is required. Please plan on arriving around 7:05 to get settled.

Hope you'll join us!

Ann

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com, certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach. Ann coaches people to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, clients become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness they want.

This non-meetup, public event is co-sponsored by Roots and Wings and New Possibilities Coaching as a community service, and is being shared with you because of it's applicability to law of attraction.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free community event: Connecting to Your Best Self
